title: The Crying Detective
description: The Crying Detective gets to the bottom of a gruesome murder by connecting with his feelings.
quote: Why are you avoiding talking about your mother?
altHero: David Harbour Jr. as the crying detective
alt2: the detective lies on a therapist’s couch
alt3: the therapist holds up a paper with “Big Jim!” written on it
alt4: the detective leaves the therapist’s office in a hurry
